name: Nurisya Ilyana!
greetingText: I'm really grateful to know you
wishText:
May this special day of your life be filled with very special things that life can offer;) 
 Every day with you is one great celebration and filled only with beautiful moments. Thank you for all the good moments that you brought into my life. 

 Happy birthday, and I wish you all the best. Love you! 
 It is the right time to say this right? :D
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to my favorite person in the whole world...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realized, I wanted to do something
